title: Is buying coaching from a elo boosting website allowed?
body: I know geting a elo boost isn't allowed but buying coaching from a elo boosting website maybe?

replies.body: coaching is fine. Boosting is not

Someone coaching you is cool, someone boosting you is *totally not*. It wouldn't be fair to not allow coaching for everyone if the pro players have their own coaches and analysts. :P

Let me know if that cleared it up for you.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=7Tk2yweA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-22T23:18:38.527+0000)

> Someone coaching you is cool, someone boosting you is *totally not*. It wouldn't be fair to not allow coaching for everyone if the pro players have their own coaches and analysts. :P
